LightningComponentBundle.description: A messaging utility for lighting web components.

property.name: messageType
property.label: Message Type
property.description: The type of message you would like to display

property.name: showMessage
property.label: Show Message
property.description: This determines if the component is shown to the user

property.name: allowClose
property.label: Allow Close
property.description: Allow the user to close the message, this does not apply to prompts

property.name: maxWidth
property.label: Max width (%)
property.description: This will set the max with of the alert, inline, or illustration component. Please supply a number

property.name: messageTitle
property.label: Message Title
property.description: The title of the message being displayed

property.name: messageBody
property.label: Message Body
property.description: The details of the message being displayed

property.name: messageVariant
property.label: Message Variant
property.description: Please see the user guide for the designated variants

property.name: showIcon
property.label: Show Icon
property.description: This determines if the icon is shown to the user

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: Icon names can be found in the Lightning design system, prefix with the category ie. utility:open

property.name: iconSize
property.label: Icon Size
property.description: The type of message you would like to display

property.name: iconVariant
property.label: Icon Variant
property.description: Please see the user guide for the designated variants

property.name: iconAlternativeText
property.label: Icon Alternative Text
property.description: Please supply alternative text for the icon

property.name: illustrationName
property.label: Illustration Name
property.description: Please select the Illustration you would like to display

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Please supply a button label if using a prompt
